titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend the deduction for contributions of real property made for conservation purposes.
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend the deduction for contributions of real property made for conservation purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to extend through 2008 the tax deduction for charitable contributions of real property made for conservation purposes.
